posts.message:
Hurry and Register, I will present the on April 10, in the MVP Webinar - Live Webcast "Load Balancing Exchange 2010 in the real world" (Middle East), learn the secrets of load balancing in Exchange 2010, how to use LoadMaster to loadbalance Exchange traffic, tips and tricks from the field all in ARABIC for the first time, space is limited, so hurry and book your calendar.

https://www3.gotomeeting.com/register/132353830
posts.caption: www3.gotomeeting.com
posts.description: KEMP Technologies proudly presents an exclusive MVP live webcast about load balancing Exchange 2010 in the real world.     Learn the latest from Microsoft Exchange MVP Mahmoud Madgy, who will speak about the actual steps of planning and deploying the LoadMaster for Microsoft Exchange 2010.

posts.message:
Pro Tip for the Google Hangout: After you start the hangout, install the "Hangout Toolkit". In one of the tabs you can find "Lower Third" which will let you add the blue bar with any text you like, your name and Twitter handle for example.
Also, it doesn't have to be blue, you can pick whatever color you like.

posts.message:
We have the following vacancies at GetSircles - please let us know if you are interested by forwarding your CV and portfolio to jobs@getsircles.com  Lead PHP Developer 

Skills 

+ A go-getter, who doesn’t accept something can’t be done because it’s never been done. 
+ 5+ years experience writing Object-Oriented PHP/mySQL-backed sites. 
+ Excellent HTML/CSS skills and you’re kinda proud about it. 
+ Experience using Javascript/jQuery to create amazing user experiences. 
+ The skills and initiative to sometimes single-handedly take a project from concept to launch. 
+ The ability to work effectively with a team of other talented front-end and back-end developers and designExperience using MVC frameworks (CodeIgniter, Cake, Zend, etc.) 

+ Familiarity with Facebook APIs 
+ Gamer at heart.
Instacode lets you hipsterize your code snippets in a matter of seconds.

posts.message:
شباب محتاج طريقه أعرف اوصل بيها للايميل بتاع مستخدمي تويتر
أنا عملتها في ابلكيشن الفيسبوك عن طريق الجافا اسكربت
و دورت بصراحة كتير عن طريق جوجل اني ألاقي حد جاب الطريقه اني اوصل بيها لايميل بتاع مستخدم التويتر و ملقتش حاجه
حد عنده خلفيه الموضوع ينفع اصلاً زي الفيسبوك ولا لا ؟؟
